turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good morning Mike.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hey Tracey, how is your morning going?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not that great I have a headache, my temples really hurt.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wow would you like some meds?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will only make it worst.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry to here that boss.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about some coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, that should work name the place and I'll go.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well you don't have to I'll call it in.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wow they do that now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'm ordering from the local grocery store .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh yeah?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what am I picking up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about a tall Espresso with 2 shots.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay got it, anything else.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay when will this be ready?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give it about 10 -15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Will I need a credit card or its already paid for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh I remember doing this.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: When i ordered they said it would be sent to your mobile device

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well see you soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you sure you don't want anything ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well can you add a Gingerbread latte as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay Ill make a note so you get the receipt sent to the phone.
